definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: appendage (term. techn. of P);—most prob. (fat) appendage, a (fatty) mass at opening of liver of sacrificial animal, extending to kidneys (v. Di Dr:Polychr. Bible, Le 3:4);—[[הַיּׁתֶרֶת עַל־הַכָּבֵד]] Ex 29:13, Le 3:4, Le 3:10, Le 3:15, Le 4:9, Le 7:4; [[מִן־הַכָּבֵד]] ´[[הַיּ]] Le 9:10; cstr. [[יׁתֶרֶת הַכָּבֵד]] Ex 29:22, Le 8:16, Le 8:25, Le 9:19 (all P).
